reviewText: This DVD is a full season of shows.  It's so refreshing to see how Porter William gets all his ducks in a row for shopping, preparing meals and the great table settings or other presentations.  The wonderful thing about his show is that he inspires you to think creatively, from memories and from watching.  This is a must for anyone who loves to cook and eat good food.  He will show you it's not hard and put on your thinking cap for a little creativity.  Get this one!
